subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With a 69-73 record in his first seven seasons, Matt Cain was one of the unluckiest pitchers in baseball. But he is 9-2 this season, including last week’s perfect game.
snippet: With a 69-73 record in his first seven seasons, Matt Cain was one of the unluckiest pitchers in baseball. But he is 9-2 this season, including last week’s perfect game.
